text: Peter Robbins (born Louis G. Nanasi; August 10, 1956 â€“ January 18, 2022) was an American actor. He became well known in the 1960s as being the first actor to voice Charlie Brown in the Peanuts animated specials. Robbins was born in Los Angeles, California. Robbins killed himself on January 18, 2022 at his home in Oceanside, California. He was 65. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American child actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Suicides in California Category:Suicide in 2022
title: Peter Robbins (actor)
